sourcesContent:
import { Form } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function PersonalInfo() { const [Character, fetchCharacter] = useState({}) let { id } = useParams(); console.log("dllm " +id); const getData = () => { fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/"+id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { console.log(json); fetchCharacter(json) }) } useEffect(() => { getData() }, [id]) return ( <>

{Character['name']}

Personal Info

  • Status: {Character['status']}
  • Gender: {Character['gender']}
  • Species: {Character['species']}
  • Location: {Character.location && Character.location.name ? Character.location.name : '' }
  • Origin: {Character.origin && Character.origin.name ? Character.origin.name : '' }
  • Created Date: {Character['created']}

Episodes

Name

Air Date

Episode

Created Date

) }
